knimeNode.name: Database Array Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes multiple data tables to a preconfigured database connection.

fullDescription.intro: Establishes and opens a preconfigured connection to a database. The connection settings are taken from the information provided by the user in KNIME's preferences dialogue. Make sure you have filled in all necessary information. The node scans the data at the input port and checks whether the database contains the corresponding tables or not. If all corresponding tables exist, all data from the input port tables will be written to the corresponding database tables.

ports.inPort: Array containing multiple tables with data to write into database.
